root.str: Customize your soldier's voice with this Kommando Voice Pack. NC Male use only.
Customize your Magrider with Carapace Plating. VS use only.
Apply the single use Indar Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds the Tubular Bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 900 rounds.
Allows use of the long range 10x Mach-10 sniper scope.
Player-made structures take time to build, and are much more vulnerable to enemy fire while still being constructed. Try not to place structures while enemy vehicles are nearby.

Activate to passively reload your weapons for 9 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.

TR MAX Ability. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 375 rounds.

Genudine Dynamics released the highly mobile Claw GD-66 shotgun early in the 29th century. Its lightweight action allows for a higher rate of fire than other pump-action shotguns on the market. NC use only.
Creates a long lasting smoke screen around the Harsser that disrupts visibility and lock-ons for 14 seconds.
NC - Submachine Gun - Mid - V1 Description
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 32.
Reading the Map - PlanetSide 2 Basic Training
This item will unlock for purchase at BR 15.
Woe be unto he, who does not heed the call of Liberty. VS use only.
Attaches a 3.75x optical zoom to your weapon.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rockets.
Single Use Indar Savanna Armor Camo
Applies a Crystal Camo 02 camo pattern to your character. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Heya friendo. Representative Tightpants up there mentioned you might be stopping by. Need someone to grease the wheels without spilling it all over them shiny boots, right?
This gold laser sight increases the weapon's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Increases the amount of Cortium harvested per second by 20%.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 12.

Commissioned by the undying founder of the Vanu Sovereignty for use as his own personal sidearm, Briggs' variant of the Beamer, The Immortal, features an integrated suppressor that retains stopping power even at a distance.
The NS-11CP's compact frame makes it a viable close range option over its predecessor, the NS-11P, and just as effective as the original NS-11C. All factions can use NS weapons.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Nice job on catching them all. The guys over at R&D are going to love piecing this thing together. Head back to Sanctuary when you're ready to drop it off.

Nanite Systems' mightiest anti-tank weapon received a facelift with the release of The Kraken, a commemorative Auraxium-plated Decimator. Its powerful warheads create a miniaturized singularity upon impact.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Emerson:</font> Lastly, we get all sorts of fun toys. I'm sure your equipment is great and all, but our R&D department has really kicked it into high gear since Esamir exploded.
This customization adds a Light Green decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
The Plasma Cannon Tank Destroyer is used by Vanu Sovereignty to seek out and destroy enemy tanks
A special edition Darkstar hardlight armor. For VS heavy assault only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 shells.
It appears we've pushed the enemy from Outpost Echo to Substation Coral and we'll continue the fight there.
I need to catch a ride!
Failed to join channel: Invalid password or access denied
Contains Darkstar Armor for all non-MAX infantry classes.
Apply the Splatter camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the speed at which your shields recharge to full by 42%, and reduces the delay before your shield begins recharging by 1 second.
Don't give up, we're still in it!
Sabot Rocklets sacrifice damage for increased accuracy at range. When equipped, alternate fire is replaced with a low-bloom 3-round burst, and projectile velocity is increased for both firemodes.
Releases powerful arcs of electricity to nearby enemies
Spawn any Air Vehcile to use to fight enemy airpower.
The versatile T1B Cycler is nearly identical to the original, with an added accurate burst fire mode. TR use only.
Integrated power cells increase Jump Jet maximum fuel by 30%, and Ambusher Jump Jet's cooldown is reduced by 0.6 seconds.
Improved vertical thrust, pitch, and agility.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Mosquito Inertial Dampener - Level 3
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 540 seconds.
Customize your Flash with this yellow blinking antenna ball. NC use only.
The bolt-action XM98's dialed-in power core interface allows for a remarkably versatile plasma sniper rifle. VS use only.
You have been ejected from the vehicle because the owner has locked the vehicle.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Remember that using the "J" key will always initialize the Join Combat protocol. Join Combat will transport you to places where conflicts are currently taking place.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
Increases projectile velocity by 25%, while reducing magazine size by 25.

While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 50 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 240 seconds, five can be carried.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.25 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 75 meters.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 700 rounds.
Gunner Kill Assist Share - Hardlight Barrier
Apply the single use Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 5%.
A squad was removed from the platoon.
Kill enemy players as a Combat Medic.

Cloaks the infiltrator for up to 8.5 seconds. Sprint speed is increased by 25% and falling damage is negated while cloaked. Recharges in 11 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
The Coyote Missile platform's proximity-based homing missiles excel at destroying lightly armored aircraft, but are less proficient at harming heavily armored targets. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 225 rounds.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 5.63% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
A Republic control node is under attack!
Roll out in style with this custom rail guard for your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Activate and defend the data device for 10 seconds while it uploads the data.

With preparations finally completed, Coordinator Tolland rallies the soldiers of Auraxis to Sanctuary's Observation Deck for their final pre-departure briefing. Meanwhile, Representative Nalla of Nascent Expeditions forges ahead with her ambitious plan to open the path to the abandoned tropical paradise. Oshur awaits!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> One of our technicians advises me that this vehicle may be capable to shunting the "Tempest" energy accumulated on the vehicle, and be resistant to the hardships of that roaming storm as well.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Diagnostics systems have been enabled and show minimal damage. Please purge any graffiti from the area with your Nano-Armor Kit. I have been told that eliminating intruders will also fulfill mission parameters. The choice is yours, operative.
You cannot change the member to that rank.
Grants access to the Ammunition Belt which allows soldiers to carry 1 additional magazine for both their primary and sidearm weapons.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 shots.
Earned when an ally exits your Galaxy and scores a kill soon after.
Decreases the stationary fall rate of the Scythe by 2 KPH.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Adds tire spikes to the Harasser. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 19 shells.
Kill enemies as a Heavy Assault.
The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. This variant features a unique gold plating.
Introduced in the early 29th century, the LA4 Partisan heavy pistol features heavy recoil, damage and a high rate of fire.
Hold [%s] to turn on Tempest Siphon
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Good job, soldier. Thanks to your efforts we have been able to pinpoint the origin of the signal. Huh. It's coming from "Desolation." An asteroid?
Are you sure you want to destroy these items and create a new item?
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
The Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Improves thruster efficiency, increasing total air time by 15 seconds.
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Apply the Digital camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Construction with Nano-Cycler technology is easy and fun! To start, simply <font color="#7ff4ff">select an eligible component.</font>
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, this thing on? Alright. Warden Hadley here. There was nothing in the contract about playing nicey nice with the VS and TR.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
Adds the Goliath style hubcaps to your Flash. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">???:</font> Waking up in this form, being the only voice in my head. It feels... different.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply this glowing decal to your vehicle.
Improves the ANT's ability to manuever in combat situations and over rough terrain by improving traction, turning rate, brakes, and reverse speed.

Unlocks the Tempest Shield for your ability loadout slot.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
You have no recorded videos on disk...
Locking a continent provides benefits to the dominating empire. Each continent provides a different benefit.

Generates a shield for the Sunderer when deployed that will absorb up to a certain amount of damage, but will regenerate over time. Damage done to the Sunderer or the shield will delay the shields regeneration for 6 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> There are also notes on nearby locations. Vanu constructs? They are listed as giving off an unusual energy signature. Anything of alien origin is worth investigating. I have marked their positions on your map.
Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and a 7.5 second cooldown between uses.
Get kills with the Orbital Strike.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 165 rounds.
Revives nearby fallen soldiers when used.
Custom-built for Sigma Squad's infamous Hossin Rebirth mission, the unique Tempest SMG performs similar as a carbine at long distances.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius.

USE
From the map screen Right-click on a facility to install this module.

DESCRIPTION
Liberators and Galaxies cost 30% fewer nanites when pulled from the target facility.

Each craft will produce 5 of this module.

Lasts 20 minutes. Additional modules of this type increase the duration 20 minutes up to a max of 60 minutes.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> That is an excessively long drop. Continue your investigation, acolyte. Someone clearly wanted to keep this location hidden.
Awarded for mastery of the Reaver, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim proves its owner's command over the skies.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70 rounds.
By joining a squad you can gain the support of several classes and have friends to watch your back and assist you with securing objectives.

Increase the base 30% orbital strike damage resistance of the vehicle to 49% In addition, the vehicle is no longer affected by physics impulses from orbital strikes and other weaponized sources while undeployed.
50% off select items in the Depot.
The Hepta scope utilizes a more versatile 7x magnification that makes it a solid choice for both long and medium ranges.
Boosts are a good way to increase your experience or resource gain. Check them out in the Depot.
Further increases the strength of Nanoweave Armor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 rockets.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Lightning. TR use only.
Customize your Flash with this purple blinking antenna ball. NC use only.
You already have a player report pending with customer service. You must wait to issue a new player report.
The AF-2 Rapier's high rate of fire allows it to outperform other automatic pistols at point blank range.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Best hurry, time is ticking down.
NC Patriot Flare Gun Copper Medal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.

We are the <font color="#FF574B">Terran Republic</font>, the rightful and lawful authority of Auraxis. We discovered and colonized this world. Now we fight to restore peace and reunite our wayward brothers and sisters who have violently and unlawfully seceded.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Liberator. NSO use only.
Increases the speed at which an Infiltrator can hack enemy equipment terminals by 30%.
Generate strength by projecting power over contested territories.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 rounds.
You've done the TR proud today!
You were killed because you were too close to the vehicle pad.
Based on a modified Fracture design, the Gatekeeper retains the feel of its forerunner but incorporates a faster fire rate and projectile speed while increasing overall accuracy.
Strike fear into your opponents with this skeletal facepaint. Provides a+10% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.
Adds the Baron style hubcaps to your Sunderer. VS use only.
Unlock the Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern for your armor, weapons and vehicles. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 9 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

You automatically spot targets who damage you, and while not inside a vehicle, you are also notified on the HUD when spotted by an enemy.<font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles. MAX units can equip.</font>
Customize your ground vehicle by adding the Jackpot Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> You showed great wisdom in delivering the symbolic Chains of Vanu to me. It depicts the battle between the body's complacency and the mind's desire. A gift well given.
Increases the top speed of the Vanguard by 10 KPH.
Increases the amount of damage the deployment shield can withstand by 10%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rockets.
Apply the Lightning Strike camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> But that will need to wait until we get a better idea of where we are and who or what will try to kill us. Because you and I both know that this truce is already over.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Sleigh Bells horn. All factions can use this gear.
Extended magazine certification for the Harasser Gatekeeper has been removed and refunded. It no longer fit with the redesign of the weapon.
When activated, the Harasser is encased in a coating that allows it to slip through enemy gate shields. Lasts 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.
Periodically restocks ammunition for you and your vehicle.
Increases the range of enemy explosive detection
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Golden Snowman Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rockets.
This bundle provides the full set of schematics from the release of the construction system at a great discount! TR only.
Unlock various gadgets for the Mosquito's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Reduces damage taken by indirect AOE hits for 1 hour. Rank 4 required.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 grenades.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.
Kill enemies with the NS Deep Freeze, Little Helper, NS-W Survivor, C-4 Present, or Icikill.
Make your presence known with this low-pitch horn from Nanite Systems. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the time it takes for the Engineer's Anti-Infantry MANA turret to overheat to 9 seconds
More accurate when moving in iron sights.
Applies a special Zoran decal to your vehicle.
Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 10 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1350 rounds.
Apply the single use Indar Rock camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
AN ERROR HAS OCCURRED. PLEASE CONTACT CUSTOMER SERVICE FOR ASSISTANCE.
Keep Auraxis turning! Become a Member and support Planetside 2.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 630 rounds.
Contains a LA39 Bruiser plus 1000 Certs
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Designed as a replacement for standard iron sights in close-quarters combat, the Holo-Projected Reticle sight creates an accurate dot-and-circle reticle above the top rail.
Happy 5th Anniversary! Celebrate five years of PlanetSide with this festive colorburst horn.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Allows the user to become completely invisible while stationary.
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Leaf camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The Engineer can unlock and place Anti-Tank Mines to destroy enemy vehicles (and MAX units!) that run over them.
Apply the Shard camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Apply the Heavy Metal camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Clown on your enemies in this simple grease facepaint. Provides a +10% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 15.5 minutes.
The Valkyrie is a six person aircraft used for close air support and transportation. It is crewed by a pilot and a forward gunner.
Activate to disrupt lock-on attempts and missiles tracking the vehicle for 8 seconds. Can be activated once every 30 seconds.
Apply the single use Arid Forest camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Earned when your squad members spawn on your deployed squad beacon.

When activated, a rapidly decaying shield mesh surrounds the soldier and absorbs up to 450 damage; power is recharged by 38% when the operating soldier kills an enemy. This shield passively recharges to full over 36 seconds.
Ground Vehicles: Destroy 250 aircraft using the skyguard
TR need at least 36% territory control
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Liberator by 6KPH.
Adds 100 rounds to the default magazine size.
Reduces NMG's full recharge time to 26 seconds.
This customization adds a Daisy decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Chimera's survivability on the field. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the top speed of the Scythe by 20 KPH.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2025 rounds.
Customize your Sunderer and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
Squad leaders cannot use squad deploy.
Adds 14 rounds to the default magazine size.
Aim for the head! Headshots provide big damage bonuses, letting you drop enemies more quickly.
Chrome Venril Sathir Bust Hood Ornament
Apply the Matte Black camo pattern to your vehicle.
Eyes on an enemy air transport!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 bombs.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.
Kill enemies as a passenger or gunner while in a vehicle with at least two occupants.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 54 rounds.

Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 175%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>
Atmospheric readings are off the charts. It appears that the loss of this Warpgate may have triggered some failures in the terraforming technology that made this planet livable.
Brightness will take effect in Fullscreen mode
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rockets.
Our control node is being attacked!
Consolidates the aim down sights pattern into a singular projectile while increasing the spread of the hipfire fan by 50%, and increasing the overall recoil of the weapon by roughly 25%.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
The aircraft terminal allows the defending team to purchase vehicles.

The Dervish is an airborne, heavy fighter. The pilot commands light forward-facing weaponry while a secondary gunner operates a top-turret that is capable of warding off enemy air vehicles and applying additional pressure to attack targets.
The Infiltrator is a sniper class with a short-duration cloaking ability, spotting tools, and the ability to hack enemy terminals so your team can use them.
The Prowler defensive certification 'Reinforced Side Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.
Adds 3 missiles to the default magazine size.
Cannot be deployed at this location.
Increases the repair speed of the Nano-Armor Kit by 13%; also increases the overheat threshold to 11.5 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Are you sure you want to change the Outfit Message of the Day?
The versatile M77-B's balance of stopping power, accuracy, and rate of fire make it an excellent choice for Infiltrators that have been provided with limited information for a mission. TR use only.

We have received reports of enemy combatants spotted around The Shattered Warpgate in the northeastern Esamir. While we have an agreement with Nanite Systems to aid research and recovery efforts in the area, that does not mean we will allow the enemy to gain an advantage in this fight. Head to The Shattered Warpgate region and eliminate hostile threats.
Adds the Sandblaster Windshield to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Guess this was a bust. Maybe we just finished the last to-do list of one of the researchers? Hey, wait. Is that a keycard sticking out of the sand?
Applies a decal to your armor or vehicle.
Get a selection of Galaxy weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price!
Adds green chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. TR use only.
You have DBC to claim! Head to the depot and hit the claim button.
Adds a bumper to the Harasser. VS use only.
Apply the Bacon camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
This black right-handed NS-20 Gorgon is a slow firing heavy machine gun effective at eliminating armored targets, but can challenge close-range infantry as well. All factions can use NS weapons.
Reduces the lock on time of the missile launcher by 20%.
Use the Engineer Repair Tool to Repair the Vehicle Terminal
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
This customization adds a L337 decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Please select a category for further assistance, or click close to return to the game.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Apply the Catscratch camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
You cannot Join Combat while you are dead.

Activate to repair 10% of the vehicle over 5 seconds. Also prevents the vehicle from overheating when firing during that time. If the vehicle is on fire or overheating when activated, it will also immediately remove those effects. Can be activated once every 55 seconds.

Overheating occurs when firing the primary weapon while deployed into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Lightning to 11 minutes.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Receive HUD notifications when an enemy has spotted you.
Attaches a 1.25x optical zoom to your weapon.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Weapon mount on the roof of the ANT. Operated by the passenger in seat 1.
Reduces the movement speed penalty while your overshield is active by 25%. <font color="#dc9c36">Heavy Assault only.</font>
The Satyr's dual-barrel design provides high damage potential over a five-round volley. NSO use only.
Apply the Hyper camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Enemies cannot pass through the force field unless they hack the adjacent door lock
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.

A new off-world Warpgate has been discovered and the New Conglomerate intends to be the first to claim its resources. The immense amount of power required to stabilize the connection, even for a short time, can only be drawn from a Containment Site. Soldiers have been enlisted to reroute power in the facility while our technicians calibrate their systems.
The LA70 Stampede MG's high rate of fire is unmatched by other weapons in its class.
Apply the Cyan Chrome camo pattern to your armor.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 250 health. This effect does not trigger from quick melee attacks.
While piloting a Galaxy or Valkyrie on Esamir, travel more than 3000m with at least 2 additional occupants inside.
Player name not valid. Please check the name and try again.
Travel on foot with at least 1 ally within 10 meters. Cannot be completed in Sanctuary or at warpgates.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.

This revolutionary device uses patented Nanite technology to <font color="#7ff4ff">break down implants</font> and <font color="#7ff4ff">reform them</font> into <font color="#7ff4ff">brand new</font> ones!
Squads must have 2 or more members to be listed publicly
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Greetings operative, we appreciate your interest in this mission. I have been told to direct you to the marked Containment Site. I will brief you further upon arrival.

The Lancer AE's particle accelerator is capable of firing a focused, high-velocity anti-armor projectile with pinpoint accuracy. The weapon has three charge-levels which increases damage and ammunition used. VS use only.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 62%.
You must complete the tutorial before joining the battle for Auraxis. Your character will receive certification points on completion.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rockets.
Contains Security Force Armor for all non-MAX infantry classes. NSO use only.
Lightweight forest camo plating to complement the look of your soldier. VS use only.
Unlock passive, always-on Certifications for the Flash ATV.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Could not join the squad because of empire restriction.
Allows a Squad Leader to lay out tactical instructions on their squad members' map displays
Deploys decoy flares that will jam any lock-ons as well as missiles that are actively tracking.
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 4 minutes; also increases the radius in which the pack will resupply ammo to 5 meters.
Unlock the AR-101 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Mercenary Voice Pack. NC Female use only.
If your allegiance lies with good quality at a cheap price, this bundle may be for you. Note: Bundle contains equivalent weapons for all 3 Empires.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 245 rounds.
Kill Halloween mask-wearing enemies while wearing a Halloween mask.Completing this directive awards the title "the Slayer"
VS: MAX Flame 01 Right: Rail: Extended Description

This rack of anti-air missiles lock onto enemy aircraft, unleashing a barrage of four havoc warheads. On impact, mechanical targets will be affected by a destabilizing field that prevents them from being repaired for up to 6 seconds. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1125 rounds.
Scorpion's payload now sets infantry targets aflame dealing 80% of its base explosive damage over 3 seconds, but now only deals 20% of its base explosive damage in the initial blast.
